title: Nioxin System 3 Cleanser & Scalp Therapy Conditioner Treated Hair Set Duo 33.8 oz
description: Product Description Nioxin System 3 uses a moisturizing infusion of rare, protective herbs and botanicals that help to safeguard the scalp from drying irritation caused by various chemical services. This system addresses problems associated with noticeably thin-looking hair and allows you to maintain a healthy scalp environment for fuller, thicker, healthier-looking hair.
